title: For you madam. [No. 70/08] = Pour vous madame
brief_description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. A thermal spa resort named after the Empress Eugenie, wife of Napoleon III. 2. Fashions for Winter 1970. 3. Spa resorts in the area of South-West France. 4. Shows the process of making ceramic tiles which are used to decorate the resorts.
